snippet: Internet Brands, which bought Wikitravel in 2005 without securing copyright to the site’s travel reviews, is now in a legal battle with the Wikimedia Foundation over reproduction of its content.
abstract: Link by Link column observes that Internet Brands, which bought Wikitravel in 2005 without securing copyright to site’s travel reviews, is now in a legal battle with the Wikimedia Foundation over reproduction of its content.
lead_paragraph: Internet Brands, which bought Wikitravel in 2005 without securing copyright to the site’s travel reviews, is now in a legal battle with the Wikimedia Foundation over reproduction of its content.

headline.seo: Wikitravel, Once a Profit Dream, Now Bedevils Its Owner
headline.main: Travel Site Built on Wiki Ethos Now Bedevils Its Owner
headline.print_headline: A Travel Site Built on the Wiki Ethos Now Bedevils Its Owner
